name: placessearchinradius
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mapreflex.
Tool description: US Zip Codes, Cities, States and Counties boundaries API, which provides info in common GeoJson format for instant integration with existing maps like Google, etc., or with your custom application.
API description: Get Places boundaries in circle with given radius (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

latitude.description: Latitude of radius center. Test example: 40.61

longitude.description: Longitude of radius center. Test example: -74.72

radius.description: Radius of the search area in miles (min value is 1, max value is 50).
